wikipedia_page.main: Sarah Ruth Bullock (born 17 March 1964) is a British Church of England bishop. Since 2019, she has served as Bishop of Shrewsbury, an area bishop in the Diocese of Lichfield. She was previously Archdeacon of York since 2013.

response: The current bishop is Sarah Bullock, since her consecration on 3 July 2019.https://www.lichfield.anglican.org/news/2019/05/07/new-bishop-shrewsbury-announced/
